text:
Goodbye, Mother

<setup: a dim room, mother and son, tension>
<speaker>: Where are you going?  
<speaker>: Good-bye, mother.  
<speaker>: I can’t stay, I must go now.  

---  

<setup: emotional embrace, tears, connection>  
<speaker>: Rodya, my darling, my first born.  
<speaker>: You comforted us just by being here.  
<speaker>: My heart sensed trouble… it’s here, isn’t it?

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov shares an emotional farewell with his mother, expressing love and a sense of impending trouble.
